content:
# The error indicates that I cannot craft a stone furnace because it requires stone as an intermediate resource, which must be gathered first. 
# This suggests that I may not have the stone in a form that can be directly used for crafting, or I need to gather it first.

# To resolve this, I will gather some stone from the environment. 
# I will search for the nearest stone resource and then collect some stone.
nearest_stone_patch = nearest(Resource.Stone)  # Find the nearest stone resource.
move_to(nearest_stone_patch)  # Move to the nearest stone patch. 

# After reaching the stone patch, I will gather stone.
gather_resource(nearest_stone_patch, quantity=5)  # Gather 5 stones.
